reviews.title: A 3G BLAST FROM.THIS BOOSTER!!!
reviews.comment: I have tried several apps, all claiming to Boost My WIFI SIGNAL. I live in the woods of the boonies and my signal.exists but suffered from.fading in and out  The other apps I tried made little and sometimes NO difference. I found this app, gave it a try and W\342\200\242O\342\200\242W!  The signal.got stronger and no more fade outs! Seriously,  I don\'t know how tbey do it BUT THEY DO IT. I\'m.still amazed. I started with the free version but went PRO to support a.Wonderful.app that Really Works. Thanks LG Marquee & Galaxy Prevail
